bibl.title: L.T. Savacool v. Territory of Washington. Petition
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Before the District Court of the Territory of Washington Tom G. Langford judge presiding at at Dayton Columbia County Territory of Washington
In the matter of L.T. Savacool habeas corpus vs J.H. Hosler

This course coming on at chambers at Dayton Columbia County Territory of Washington on the 23d of February 1886, upon the application for the court and the of J.H. Hosler and the said served in his own proper person and by his attorney M.M. Gudman his attorney and the said J.H. Hosler by this attorney Robert T. Sturdevant and the case being submitted the court adjudges that the known upon which the said Savacool is held in defective and as justification for the imprisonment of here the said Savacool and therefore orders an examination made as of whether he the said Savacool is guility of any offense for which he should be held in custody whereupon the evidence is submitted to the Court and upon the evidence and how the judge Tom G. Langford finds that there is is no probable cause to find him the said Savacool guilty of any such offense and it is hereby ordererd that he the said Savacool be and he is hereby discharged from all custody and imprisonment to go hence without day and what the costs of the prosecution hence be freed by the County of Garfield of the Territory of Washington as her hereto attached

Miles fees C.A. McCabe 1 day and 50 miles $7 00 W.S Newland 1 " " " " " 7 00 Ben Butler 1 " " " " " 7 00 C.H. Seeley 1 " " " " " 7 00 JH Roberson 1 " " " " " 7 00 LP Mulkey 1 " " " " " 7 00 Josiah Butran 1 " " " " " 7 00 W E Wilson 1 " " " " " 7 00 Dan Rice 1 " " " 2 " 2 20 D C Guernsesy " " " " " 2 20 C R Dorr " " " " " 2 20
Sheriff Hoslers fees Boarding 8 days $8 00 Serving 4 and 2.40 For guarding 1 day 3.00
Clerk of Court fees Filing and Petition 60 Writ and 1.60 and .50 25 2 and filing 1.20 50 and filing one affidavit .35 3 or 1.50 Costs .50 Garfield County 2 20
I R.T. Sturdevant prosecuting attorney of the Counties of Garfield Columbia and Asotin do hereby Certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of costs and that the is correct

I William G. Langford Judge of the First Judicial District of Washington Territory and the District Court of Columbia County W.T. holding terms at Dayton do hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing case Bill and find the same correct
